questionStem: When the teacher caught the student cheating on the exam, he was filled with **dudgeon**. Which scenario best illustrates the meaning of the word **dudgeon**?
answers: a student feeling intense anger and resentment after being accused of cheating on a test
distractors: a student receiving praise for scoring high on a quiz
a teacher showing understanding towards a student who forgot their homework
a parent expressing pride in their child's good behavior at school

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates the meaning of the word **glisten**?
answers: a fresh coat of paint on a wall catching the sunlight and sparkling
distractors: a pile of old newspapers in a dimly lit room
a muddy puddle after heavy rain
a stack of dishes waiting to be washed in the kitchen

questionStem: In which scenario would you most likely use the word **proportionately**?
answers: when discussing the distribution of resources based on the size of each department in a company
distractors: a family deciding how to divide a single cake among five members
a group of friends planning a road trip and assigning tasks equally to everyone
a teacher allocating the same amount of homework to all students regardless of their abilities

questionStem: Which scenario below best illustrates the meaning of the word **corresponding**?
answers: a shopping website displaying **corresponding** accessories when you view a specific piece of clothing
distractors: a chef preparing a delicious meal
a student solving a difficult math problem
a musician practicing a new song

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best exemplifies an **eloquent** speech?
answers: a passionate speaker captivating the audience with persuasive language and compelling arguments
distractors: a scientist explaining complex theories to a group of students
a person reading a grocery list aloud
a child reciting the alphabet

questionStem: In which situation would someone be described as **pragmatic**?
answers: choosing the most efficient way to solve a problem despite not sticking strictly to a set of rules
distractors: preferring to daydream rather than work on tasks
seeking perfection in every detail without considering practicality
making decisions based purely on emotions rather than logic

questionStem: When making important financial decisions, it is crucial to be **prudent**. Which of the following actions demonstrates a **prudent** approach?
answers: carefully researching investment options before making a decision
distractors: spending money impulsively without considering the consequences
borrowing a large sum of money without a clear repayment plan
investing in speculative ventures without conducting any risk analysis

questionStem: In which situation would you most likely receive a **certificate**?
answers: completing a specialized training program in digital marketing
distractors: buying groceries at the supermarket
taking a walk in the park
watching a movie at the cinema

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates the meaning of the word **redundant**?
answers: having two identical keys that open the same door
distractors: a chef preparing a variety of dishes for a dinner party
a student studying diligently for an upcoming exam
a musician playing multiple instruments in a concert

questionStem: Which scenario below best illustrates the meaning of the word **convoluted**?
answers: a complicated legal case involving multiple parties and conflicting evidence
distractors: a straightforward recipe with clear step-by-step instructions
a short and simple bedtime story for young children
a direct path from the entrance to the exit in a maze

questionStem: Which person would most likely be described as **discerning**?
answers: a wine connoisseur who can distinguish the subtle flavors and notes of different wines
distractors: a child playing with colorful toys at a daycare
a student solving math problems in a classroom
a chef preparing a simple meal for dinner guests

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best demonstrates the trait of being **resilient**?
answers: a student who faces academic challenges but keeps working hard to improve their grades
distractors: a person who gives up easily when faced with difficulties
a worker who complains and blames others when tasks become tough
an athlete who stops training after facing a setback

questionStem: Which of the following items is most likely to be used as an **ornament**?
answers: a decorative vase displayed on a mantelpiece
distractors: a frying pan in the kitchen drawer
a hammer in a toolbox
a toothbrush in the bathroom cup

questionStem: Which situation below is **ambiguous**?
answers: a cryptic message left by an unknown sender
distractors: a clear instruction manual for assembling furniture
a unanimous decision made by all committee members
a colorful painting with vibrant brushstrokes

questionStem: Which of the following actions would be considered the most **extravagant**?
answers: booking a luxury yacht for a week-long cruise in the Caribbean
distractors: shopping for groceries at a local market
taking a walk in the park on a sunny day
having a simple dinner at home with family

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best describes a situation with a **surplus**?
answers: A farmer harvested more crops than he could sell and had an excess supply.
distractors: A student who studied just enough to pass the exam.
A chef who ran out of ingredients while cooking dinner.
A company that sold all its products quickly and had empty shelves.

questionStem: Which scenario best exemplifies the meaning of the word **humble**?
answers: a famous actor regularly volunteering at a local soup kitchen without seeking recognition
distractors: a wealthy business owner driving a luxury car and flaunting expensive jewelry
a politician boasting about their accomplishments during a campaign speech
a celebrity demanding special treatment at a restaurant and acting entitled

questionStem: In which scenario is the term **proliferate** most likely to be used?
answers: a species of insects quickly multiplies in a warm and moist environment
distractors: a street performer attracts a large crowd with an amazing magic trick
a chef receives praise for creating a delicious new recipe
a student carefully organizes their notes for an upcoming exam

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates the meaning of the word **qualification**?
answers: a job applicant listing their education and work experience on their resume
distractors: a chef preparing an extravagant meal for a special event
a student participating in a track and field competition
a musician practicing their instrument for a concert

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates the meaning of the word **coast**?
answers: a family driving alongside the ocean, enjoying the view and breeze
distractors: a group of friends hiking up a mountain trail
a student studying hard for exams at a library
a chef preparing gourmet dishes in a restaurant kitchen
